quest.name: ┣┨̈//̈ No┨ΦounΔ•••
journal: G'raha Tia is ready to set forth.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Considering the Omicrons' single-minded character, the lack of new orders does seem unusual. I agree that we should seek out their leader.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: “Pointless exercise”... What does that mean, I wonder...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: So, the console we seek lies on the far side of this isle.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Given the nature of the ground, the route may not be entirely direct as it seems.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Let us all watch our step as we make our way.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The glow would suggest it is still operational. But how are we to interact with it...?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Greetings, Sir! Can you hear me? Say something if you can! Awaken! Activate! ...Password!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Well, I tried.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: This appears to be the console.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: But it seems...unresponsive.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Would you care to take a look at it?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Judging by the size of the Omicrons we've met, I'm reasonably confident the console is controlled via the orb.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You try touching, smacking, and attuning with the console, but there is no response...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: No luck, I see.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: But there must be a way to activate it. There must...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I remember when we set Omega loose to deal with Shinryu...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: An Allagan weapon, we once thought. And here we are now, visiting a recreation of its home world.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I can only imagine how else these beings will surprise us...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Though I never encountered Omega myself, in conceiving the means to send the Crystal Tower to the First, we borrowed much from its mastery of the rift.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Indeed, so many times did I read the report of your battle, I believe I could recite it word for word.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Omega's miniature likeness also survived to the future, if a little worse for the wear. I must confess, I was delighted to see it again in the present.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Though I never encountered Omega myself, in conceiving the means to send the Crystal Tower to the First, we derived no small inspiration from its abilities.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: In the course of my research, I devoured every single piece of literature I could find on the being. To think that the knowledge would prove useful here, at the edge of existence...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Let us focus our search on the outpost.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Alisaie and I will try speaking with the Omicrons this time, in the hopes we might learn something new.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Meanwhile, perhaps you and G'raha could observe them from a distance.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: These beings are systematic and routine by nature. If there are any that aren't, it shouldn't be too difficult to spot them.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If there are no questions, then let us begin at once!

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: As we came this way, I believe I spied a promising vantage point. Follow me.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We will be certain to ask about the extended operations unit.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Not only do they look the same; they say the same things as well...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: And here we are. I see the twins are wasting no time with their inquiries.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Let us begin observing the Omicrons. They are supposed to be standing by, so we should look for any that aren't.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Search Base Omicron for errant Omicrons. You may move the camera, as well as zoom in and out. Target an Omicron and examine it with [???] / [???].

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: An Omicron wandering aimlessly? Where!?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Aha, I see it!

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: It's left the base. Let's follow it!

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: It's not here, but it definitely came this way. It must have used the portal.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Time to go through and see what we find...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Nothing nearby save malfunctioning units. Come─the portal awaits.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Travel through the portal?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: Bzzzt... What is your query?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Ah, you found it!

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: What are you doing here?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: ...I am looking at the tree.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Quite an unusual specimen... What is the device attached to it?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: The tree is a sample collected from another star. As it cannot survive in our environment, however, it requires life support. That is the function of the device.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: To go to such lengths to sustain it... Is there something special about this tree?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: Being foreign matter, protocol requires that we study it. As this task has been completed, the specimen may be discarded.

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: However, when I behold the tree, I am made to feel as though...there is a problem.

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: In order to become strong, we have continued to enhance ourselves. Like we did countless others, we conquered the star whence this tree came.

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: It is the last remnant of a dead world, and there is nothing towards which it may aspire. Yet it grows. Extends its branches. Sprouts leaves. Produces seeds.

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: Why does it seek to continue?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: Why was it made to behave in such a way, and to what end? I do not understand.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: ...I see. Out of curiosity, does this pertain to your duty?

dialogue.name: M017
dialogue.text: ...No, it does not. My apologies, I shall return to my designated post and assume a state of combat readiness.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: So, it was acting outside of orders...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Perhaps it is simply a malfunctioning Omicron. These are by no means uncommon.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: But it may also be a unit possessed of the ability to make decisions. One not unlike Sir...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: I believe this bears further investigation.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: To endeavor to live even if we must depend on forces beyond our control...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Tell me, Forename. One day, when this adventure becomes a part of your epic, do you think I will be mentioned in it?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Of course. Why wouldn't you be?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: Maybe in a footnote.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: You're not here so you can be in a story.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: You truly think so? That would be a...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Nay, I shouldn't say such things until the moment comes to pass. Never mind the embarrassment...

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Oh, come now, how much would it have cost you to simply nod?

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: 'Tis no simple thing to earn a place beside you, this I know full well. But it is something to hope for as I forge on.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: ...Forgive me. Let there be no doubt that fame and glory could not be further from my mind.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: And yet...I would be lying if I said that I don't relish the thought of my name being spoken in the same breath as yours.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: ...Well, we had best get on with our task.

dialogue.name: GRAHATIA
dialogue.text: Tracking down Sir, and understanding the nature of the emotion which bars our way!
